name: api_editor_Handles
description: Custom 3D GUI controls and drawing in the Scene view.

properties.name: ArrowHandleCap
properties.description: Draw an arrow like those used by the move tool.

properties.name: BeginGUI
properties.description: Begin a 2D GUI block inside the 3D handle GUI.

properties.name: Button
properties.description: Make a 3D Button.

properties.name: CircleHandleCap
properties.description: Draw a circle handle. Pass this into handle functions.

properties.name: ClearCamera
properties.description: Clears the camera.

properties.name: ConeHandleCap
properties.description: Draw a cone handle. Pass this into handle functions.

properties.name: CubeHandleCap
properties.description: Draw a cube handle. Pass this into handle functions.

properties.name: CylinderHandleCap
properties.description: Draw a cylinder handle. Pass this into handle functions.

properties.name: Disc
properties.description: Make a 3D disc that can be dragged with the mouse.

properties.name: DotHandleCap
properties.description: Draw a dot handle. Pass this into handle functions.

properties.name: DrawAAConvexPolygon
properties.description: Draw anti-aliased convex polygon specified with point array.

properties.name: DrawAAPolyLine
properties.description: Draw anti-aliased line specified with point array and width.

properties.name: DrawBezier
properties.description: Draw textured bezier line through start and end points with the given tangents.

properties.name: DrawCamera
properties.description: Draws a camera inside a rectangle.

properties.name: DrawDottedLine
properties.description: Draw a dotted line from p1 to p2.

properties.name: DrawDottedLines
properties.description: Draw a list of dotted line segments.

properties.name: DrawGizmos
properties.description: Draw the Gizmos for the specified camera.

properties.name: DrawLine
properties.description: Draws a line from p1 to p2.

properties.name: DrawLines
properties.description: Draw a list of line segments.

properties.name: DrawOutline
properties.description: Draws an outline around the specified GameObjects in the Scene View.
